General.Name: Micro Leasing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Micro Leasing Public Company Limited provides hire-purchase finance for six-wheel and ten-wheel trucks, and motorcycles in Thailand. It also offers life and non-life insurance brokerage, and finance services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.
